case_title: Sunit C. Khatau vs. Dilip Dharamsey Khatau

appellant.name: Sunit C. Khatau (represented by legal heirs)
appellant.description: Legal heirs of Sunit C. Khatau challenging the arbitration award.

respondents.name: Dilip Dharamsey Khatau
respondents.description: Member of the DMK Group involved in the family dispute.

respondents.name: Pratap Singh Mathuradas Vissanji
respondents.role: Arbitrator appointed under the terms of the agreement.

contract_details.contract_purpose: Family dispute resolution over division of Khatau Bungalow property.
contract_details.dispute_clause: Clause specifying arbitration in case of disagreement.

precedents: Maula Bux v. Union of India
Oil & Natural Gas Corporation v. Saw Pipes Ltd.

key_arguments.appellant: Argued that the agreement had to be fully executed before obligations could be enforced. Challenged the arbitrator's decision as premature and unfair.
key_arguments.respondent: Asserted that CMK Group failed to vacate the premises, causing financial loss and delay in property division.
